    @NotNull Set<UUID>
    getExcludedPlayers()
    Returns the plugin exclude/include player list.
    When CONFIG_EXCLUDE_MODE is set to true (default), this list acts as an exclude list (players not in this list are updated).
    When CONFIG_EXCLUDE_MODE is set to false, this list acts as an include list (only players in this list are updated).

    • getExcludedPlayers

      @NotNull public @NotNull Set<UUID> getExcludedPlayers()
      Returns the plugin exclude/include player list.
      When CONFIG_EXCLUDE_MODE is set to true (default), this list acts as an exclude list (players not in this list are updated).
      When CONFIG_EXCLUDE_MODE is set to false, this list acts as an include list (only players in this list are updated).
      Angegeben von:
      getExcludedPlayers in Schnittstelle UDNApi
      Gibt zurück:
      exclude/include list

      public void setUpdatesEnabled(boolean updatesEnabled)
